attributes.action: Bring back the original Tescos Helter Skelter recipe
attributes.additional_details: Helter skelters are essential in my life and they provided me and all my friends with endless fun and happiness but the new recipe is gross and there is no worthy replacement of them.
attributes.background: Tesco has recently changed their recipe for their helter shelter ice lolly and I am petitioning to bring back the original loved and appreciated yummier recipe.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
